traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.
